KDnuggets Home » News » 2018 » May » Courses, Education » Virtual Training Events Without Leaving Your Desk ( 18:n22 )

Virtual Training Events Without Leaving Your Desk

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Agile, Business Analytics, Data Preparation, Data Science, Online Education, R, Visualization

Check out our lineup of upcoming virtual seminars, online learning courses, and customized training in your office. Space is limited, so reserve your seat early and score the best savings!


 
Join us for comprehensive training on the hottest topics in data
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
In-Depth Learning From the Comfort of Your Office
 
Did you know TDWI offers a Virtual Classroom? Maximize your training dollars—TDWI has introduced a stellar lineup of data management and analytics educational events without having to travel.

Check out our lineup of upcoming virtual seminars, online learning courses, and customized training in your office. In order to keep these courses interactive, space is limited. Reserve your seat early and score the best savings!



 
 
 
About the Virtual Classroom
 
The Virtual Training Room enables remote attendees to experience the benefits of instructor-led training without having to travel. Remote participants experience the same collaboration, instructor interaction, and learning benefits as those who are physically in the classroom. TDWI’s Virtual Training Room technology allows all students to:
  •     See and hear everything in the classroom
  •     Raise their hands and ask questions
  •     View and interact with course content
  •     Experience real-time collaboration
 
VISIT THE CLASSROOM
 
 
 
Check Out Our Upcoming Virtual Events:
 
 
 
 
 
 
New York Seminar // Data Prep, Models and Algorithms, and Deployment
June 4–6 , 2018
New York, NY
 
This three-day seminar walks attendees through a comprehensive implementation framework for value-focused analytics. Participants will be exposed to both strategic and tactical elements of predictive modeling with a view on the unique dynamics inherent in larger organizations.
 
LEARN MORE
 
 
Virtual Classroom // Hands-on: Data Science in R
June 19 , 2018
 
A full day of live, in-depth training.
One of the hottest programming languages in data science, R is the tool of choice for the world’s top data scientists and business analysts alike. For generating insightful data analysis and creating impressive visualizations, R skills are essential for anyone looking to turn data into insights. Attend this full day of live virtual training and walk away with the data science skills you need to make an immediate impact.
 
LEARN MORE
 
 
Seattle Seminar // Agile Analytics
August 27–29 , 2018
Seattle, WA
Save 20% through June 29
 
This seminar series from TDWI will help your Analytics and BI team develop the necessary culture, skills, and attitudes needed to succeed with Agile.
 
LEARN MORE
 
 
Denver Seminar // Business Analytics Fundamentals
September 17–19 , 2018
Denver, CO
Save 20% through August 3
 
Over three days, learn the cornerstones of analytics, dive into the capabilities of predictive analytics, and gain essential skills for effectively communicating your findings through data visualization. Accelerate your business analytic skills with the leaders from TDWI with this engaging, high-impact learning experience.
 
LEARN MORE
 
 
Boston Seminar // Visualization, Dashboards, & Analytics Adoption
September 24–26 , 2018
Boston, MA
Save 20% through August 10
 
This extensive three-day workshop takes participants and their own analytics challenges through a comprehensive journey of the tools and methodologies the world’s leading analytics consulting firms use to maximize adoption, reduce risk, and achieve business value through behavioral change.
 
LEARN MORE
 
 
TDWI Online Learning
 
TDWI’s World-Class Training is Now Available Online
Build your data management and analytics skills with in-depth and interactive online courses taught by industry experts and in-the-trenches practitioners. Topics range from data science with R and Python, data governance, business analytics, and data quality. Each course offers an engaging on-demand learning experience and a certificate upon completion.
 
LEARN MORE
 
 
TDWI Onsite Education
Your Team, Your Location, Our Instructors
 

Not seeing a course that meets your needs? Let us customize one for you and deliver it to your door with our expert instructors.

TDWI Onsite delivers the highest quality business intelligence (BI), analytics, and data warehousing (DW) education directly to your office so each member of your team learns the same best practices, methodology, and strategy directly from the industry gurus.

Contact me today:

Yvonne M. Baho Director, Enterprise Learning 
Phone: 978.582.7105
 E-mail: ybaho@tdwi.org
 
LEARN MORE
 
 
About TDWI
 
To review our Privacy Policy, please visit our website. 1105 Media, Inc., 9201 Oakdale Ave., Chatsworth, CA 91311
 
To know more or contact us for our services, just drop us a line at info@tdwi.org.
 
©2018 TDWI. All rights reserved.
Contact Us  |  Privacy Policy
